name: Zovid-19 Remake
description:
ZOVID-19 Remake is the remake of "Zovid-19 infestation" not featured on this platform. a top-down third person shooter game that makes fun of the coronavirus (COVID-19) where it left the planet in an alarming scenario of almost billion people infected, the same without their inner humanity, quite the opposite, all the infected have turned into veritable wild animals with an insatiable hunger for meat where they shamelessly tear animals and other people apart just in search of satiating their hunger, previously extinguishing millions of animal breeds and transforming every place they pass through a sea of blood. With the human race at risk of extinction, it's up to you to carry out a reconnaissance mission and send a message to the closest containment of people in a place known as the "anthill" where it is still unknown if there are already infected people there, or worse...

Main mission

Survive and secure the signal tower so you can send a message to the nearest containment, until then, survive your way, strafing everything that's infected derived from ZOVID-19, or... there's no other form of class! .

Difficulty
A continuous action and "almost" dull, requires A LOT of focus, skill and preferably a spare mouse at your side, a difficulty is progressive, more time playing, more hordes and more infected will come !, with new types of infected! which also differ in the need for the player before starting all the misfortune, namely: NORMAL, NIGHTMARE and HELL, both made within the game

Features and gameplay

More than 20 weapons in the store's arsenal, various bonuses and various weapons. not all weapons are better because they have a higher price, in fact some weapons are unable to kill certain infected or some cheaper weapons can finish off a horde of a specific zombie type faster than compared to an almost double weapon. of the price. You can protect the tower in a variety of ways, clogging up the surrounding area with landmines, placing various barbed wires to make it difficult for the infected to touch you or the tower, stuffing the turret around the tower that are progressive with the price, or simply disemboweling and tearing apart all the infected with all their ammo and grenades.
